article.title: Ready-to-use boxed software
article.label: Off-the-shelf
article.intro: Review the list of ready-to-use boxed software created by our team

text.p: We sell boxed off-the-shelf software, which we develop, maintain and deploy to different customers. List of ready-to-use software is constantly extending, please visit us regularly to get updates.
GS-Poker client/server software for poker rooms, based on C++, PHP and MS SQL Server.
For more details on the boxed products we offer, please contact us.
